    public interface I_ServiceManager

    • Method Detail

      • getServiceObject

        I_Service getServiceObject(java.lang.String type,
                           java.lang.String version)
                    throws ServiceManagerException
        Return a specific Service.
        Parameters:
        String - The type of the requested Service.
        String - The version of the requested Service.
        Returns:
        I_Service The Service which is suitable to handle the request.
        Throws:
        ServiceManagerException - Thrown if no suitable Service has been found.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        The name of the property in services.property, e.g. "Security.Server.Service" for "Security.Server.Service[simple][1.0]"
